 Introduction of app:

 Accounting software uses computer software to record the income and expenditure of assets.Â It not only provides a convenient tool for data collection and collation, but also provides reliable basic materials for data analysis. 

 When implementing the functionality of the app, I used some open source frameworks, as follows: 

 1. Android-PickerView in order to better choose the time.Https://github.com/Bigkoo/Android-PickerView.
